actions: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
name: Brown Bear
traits: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
